text.div:
AllergyStatusCodelist-to-allergy-status (http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/snomed/ConceptMap/AllergyStatusCodelist-to-allergy-status)

Mapping from http://decor.nictiz.nl/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.40.2.8.2.3--20150401000000 to (not specified)

ACTIVE. Published on Jan 4, 2017 3:27:28 AM by Nictiz (Nictiz: info@nictiz.nl). CC0

Maps the HCIM AllergyIntolerance release 2015 terminology for AllergyStatus to the FHIR STU3 terminology


Source CodeEquivalenceDestination CodeComment
activeequalactive
obsoleteequalinactive
completedequalresolved
nullifiedunmatchedNullified means 'entered in error'. There is no mapping for that in the AllergyIntolerance.clinicalStatus. Use AllergyIntolerance.verificationStatus = entered-in-error.
Source CodeEquivalenceDestination Code
nullifiedequalentered-in-error

name: AllergyStatusCodelist-to-allergy-status
title: HCIM AllergyStatusCodelist to allergy status
description: Maps the HCIM AllergyIntolerance release 2015 terminology for AllergyStatus to the FHIR STU3 terminology
purpose: To aid in mapping from HCIM AllergyIntolerance value set AllergyStatusCodelist to FHIR STU3 AllergyIntolerance clinicalStatus and verificationStatus

target.comment: Nullified means 'entered in error'. There is no mapping for that in the AllergyIntolerance.clinicalStatus. Use AllergyIntolerance.verificationStatus = entered-in-error.
